it.apice.sapere.management.impl
Class ReactionManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl.AbstractSAPEREAgentImpl
          it.apice.sapere.node.agents.AbstractSystemAgent
              it.apice.sapere.management.impl.ReactionManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpaceObserver, ReactionManager, SAPEREAgent, Subscriber, Runnable
public class ReactionManagerImpl
extends AbstractSystemAgent
implements ReactionManager, SpaceObserver

This class provides an implementation for the ReactionManager interface.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

checkDependencies

protected final void checkDependencies(SpaceEvent ev,
                                       MatchingEcolaw law)
                                throws AbortException

Checks if the given SpaceEvent has modified a precondition for the provided eco-law. If so an AbortException should be raised in order to revise the scheduling.

Parameters:
ev - The occurred event
law - The law that is going to be scheduled
Throws:
AbortException - Next reaction should be re-scheduled
